00193     // It's not important for the Python interface anyway.

00195     class anon_free_list : public spot::free_list
00196     {
00197     public:
00198       // WARNING: We need a default constructor so this can be used in
00199       // a hash; but we should ensure that no object in the hash is
00200       // constructed with d==0.

00202       virtual int extend(int n);
